methods.name: getMaxEntityRadius
methods.description: The maximum radius to scan for entities when trying to check bounding boxes. Vanilla's default is 2.0D But mods that add larger entities may increase this.

methods.name: increaseMaxEntityRadius
methods.description: Increases the max entity radius, this is safe to call with any value. The setter will verify the input value is larger then the current setting.

methods.name: getPartEntities
methods.description: All part entities in this world. Used when collecting entities in an AABB to fix parts being ignored whose parent entity is in a chunk that does not intersect with the AABB.
